ValidationRule.description: AD-322 to be able to update the Product Line Items when an Opportunity Stage is 'Closed Won' and the Sub-Stage is 'Written Confirmation'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Sub_Stage__c,'7.2 T&Cs Signed'),
OR( ISCHANGED(Service_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Owner__c), ISCHANGED(Gross_Percentage__c), ISCHANGED(UnitPrice) ),
AND( $Permission.System_Administrator = FALSE, $Permission.Regional_Delegated_Administrator = FALSE, $Permission.Delegated_Admin = FALSE, $Permission.Country_Delegated_Administrator = FALSE ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change this Opportunity Service because the Opportunity Stage is '7.2 T&Cs Signed'. Please contact your Country's Administrator if you need to make any updates.
